summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PiVault password manager - backend APIs fully functional, frontend working with minor UI overlay issues

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog overlays intercept pointer events preventing clicks on some buttons
ui_bugs.workaround: Force clicks or keyboard navigation (Escape key) work

passed_tests: Vault entry CRUD operations via API
Vault page rendering and basic interactions
Modal opening and form field accessibility
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay z-index issues causing click interception on password generator and add category buttons. Consider using proper modal management or adjusting CSS layers.
